code_info: CO 159, CO 160, and CO 162.  SCO 612 250 350 3 1 126 A 1 MCS C-50575.    The code is interpreted as:    S = Soaked.  C = Port Produced  O = Year Produced  612 = Packaging/Brand (4x5)  250-350 = size  3 = Count range  1 = Grade/quality  126 = Julian Date of the production day  A = Hour product produced  1 = Pallet numbers produced  MSC C-50575 = firm's current Marine sustainability certification number
